headline: Very good
pros: Good company that is a good place to work for
cons: Can improve in a few areas

headline: Great company to start career
pros:
a. Depending on the department work/life balance is welcomed.
b. Vacation time up to four weeks depending on salary grade coming in.
c. Camaraderie amongst colleagues. 
d. Remote work for many departments.
cons:
a. Growth & opportunity was a major concern, it may become difficult to 
 maneuver throughout the company even with higher education.

b. Salary isn't on par with other companies.

c. The company culture isn't adopted throughout the organization.

cons: Pay could be better but wasn't terrible

headline: Think more if you need to stay more than a month
